file.description: The final file that is the results of the rendering process. This file depends on a TeX controler file.
The master contol file that funnels all the information necessary to render this component.
The custom contol file that feeds into the the component control file.
The group contol file that feeds into the the component control file.
The group contol file that feeds into the the component control file.
The master TeX macro contol file that feeds into the the global control file.
The component style file that feeds into the the component control file. These styles will override any previous styles that are set in dependent style files.
The group style file that feeds into the the group control file. These styles will override styles that are set in the global style file.
The global style file that feeds into the the global control file. These styles are the top level styles.
The component configuration file that is created from the component type xml file.
The project configuration file that is created from the project type xml file.
The working text file that will be rendered. It is created by pre and post processes run on the source text.
The source text for the project.
